|blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267456 |website = |footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = }} Lebanon is a town in the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in Potter County. The city is about 0.53 square miles (1.37 km2) in land area, about 40% of the size of Central Park in New York City. As of 2020, it had 33 people living in it. == References == Category:Towns in South Dakota
